carrier_master.key_person: Tommy Hodges — Chairman, past ATA National Chairman
carrier_master.fit_rationale: Tommy Hodges is past ATA National Chairman. His endorsement opens doors industry-wide. Not the largest fleet but highest strategic value per truck. Shelbyville TN = Tennessee corridor.
carrier_master.secondary_pitch_angle: Titan's drivers on I-24/I-40 corridor benefit from West Memphis + Nashville proximity
carrier_master.strategic_multiplier: Hodges' ATA network = introductions to every major carrier in the Southeast. His endorsement is worth more than Titan's membership revenue.
carrier_master.exec_summary: Titan Transfer is a Shelbyville TN carrier with 201-500 trucks. Tommy Hodges (Chairman) is past ATA National Chairman. Strategic value = industry endorsement. His approval opens doors across the trucking industry.

carrier_contacts.title: Chairman (past ATA National Chairman)
carrier_contacts.notes: STRATEGIC TARGET. Past ATA National Chairman. Industry-wide endorsement value.
